library("dplyr")

# Read in data
```{r}
IAPI <- readRDS("~kelseywalker/Desktop/EPIC HOMES/R_thesis/IAPI_1.rds") 
IDI <- readRDS("~kelseywalker/Desktop/EPIC HOMES/R_thesis/IDI.rds") 
```

```{r}
IEI_results <- left_join(IAPI, IDI, by = c("id_home", "date")) %>%
  mutate( IEI = (IAPI + IDI)/2) %>%
  mutate(IAPI_percent = IAPI/ (IAPI + IDI) *100) %>%
  mutate(IDI_percent = IDI/(IAPI + IDI) *100)

IEI <- dplyr::select(IEI_results, id_home, date, IEI)
#write_rds(IDI, "IEI.rds")

```
